thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 94 of 625
thread.title: Theresa Sullivan

author: Theresa Sullivan
title: Theresa Sullivan
text: I've been a professional wardrobe stylist for over 20 years. I have been looking for an athletic wear line for myself,my clients and, my stunning 17 yr. old daughter, too! I just think that I may have found it! The perfect solutions for me, my clients and Maddie! Only negative is that the full-length Lisette legging, which i think my clients would really love, (I read lots of the reviews on your site), were sold out!! So disappointed, but I got the 7/8 length. Perhaps you can send me a pair of the full length when in stock so I can "test drive" a pair? By the way, I think that the curated monthly membership is a fabulous idea I think my clients would love as well. I'll be in touch again. Love and hugs to Kate!!!!
